channel.title: FrostyScape 317|Custome Training|100+ Custome Items|24/7
channel.description:
[center]
This is My First Server So Please Dont Hate ME.
[img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/39/frostyscapelogo.png[/img]
[b]Play: http://frostyscape.netii.net/play.php[/b] [b]Forums: http://frostyscape.netii.net Client Download: http://frostyscape.netii.net/client.jar[/b] [b]Main Features:[/b]
[b]-100% Uptime -Pk and Skilling -Castle Wars -Party Room -Full Hunter with Swamp Lizards, Implings, Birds, Kebbits, Chinchompas. -Unique Quests -Clue Scrolls -Lots Of Custome Items 100+ -Brand NEW Rsps -Christmas Event[/b]
Player Killing:
[b]-PvP Armor -Dragon Claws -Anchor -Lunar Spells -Spirit Shields[/b]
Minigames:
[b]-Castle Wars -Warrior's Guild -Duel Arena & Staking -Party Room -Pest Control -Assault -Barrow Brothers -Tokkul/Thzaar -Minigame[/b]
Bosses:
[b]-Barrelchest -Kalphite Queen -Giant Mole -Chaos Elements -Godwars Dungeon -Dagganoth Kings -Steel Dragon -King Black Dragon -TzTok-Jad[/b]
Skilling:
-Elegant Robes -Desert Robes -Lantern -Flowers -Hats -Scarves -Skiller Points & Shop -Ring of Stone Skillers Area -24 working skills including Hunter -More content added every day -Much Much More!
Pictures:
-Custome Training Area! :) [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/8986/raining.png[/img]
[b]-Lots Of Custome Items ! 100+![/b] [img]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/639/customeu.png[/img]
-Home [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img338/5624/homepu.png[/img]
-City Teleports [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img715/7335/cityk.png[/img]
-Bosses [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/2319/bossesp.png[/img]
-Minigames [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img545/5604/minigamesk.png[/img]
-PK [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img687/8022/33272148.png[/img]
-Training [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img685/9272/monsterteleport.png[/img]
-Agility And Hunter [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img202/6579/agilityg.png[/img]
-Duela Arena [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img713/4112/duela.png[/img]
-Skilling [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img72/8927/skilling.png[/img]
-Donator Tab [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img72/3045/donatertab.png[/img]
-Donator Zone [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img405/4448/donorzone.png[/img]
-Thieving [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/4097/thievn.png[/img]
-Skills [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img836/4141/skillsc.png[/img]
-Tzaar [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img27/528/tzaar.png[/img]
Come and have fun![/center]
